atom

Class AtomUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • atom.AtomUtil

  • public class AtomUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides utilities that deal with Atom class. This class provides a way to calculate:
    1. Bond length (bohr)
    2. Bond angle (degree)
    3. Dihedral angles (angle)
    4. New xyz coordinates based on Z-matrix input
    5. Center of mass
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      Generates a position of an atom based on Z-matrix input
      double getBondAngle(Atom atomi, Atom atomj, Atom atomk)
      Returns the bond angle of i-j-k (degree)
      double getBondAngle(Atom atomi, Atom atomj, Atom atomk, double[] dd)
      Returns the bond angle of i-j-k (degree) and the bond lengths dji and djk (bohr)
      double getBondLength(Atom atomi, Atom atomj)
      Returns the bond length (bohr)
      Atom getCenterOfMass(Atom[] atoms)
      Calculates the center of mass of input atoms
      double getDihedralAngle(Atom atomi, Atom atomj, Atom atomk, Atom atoml)
      Returns the dihedral angle between i-j-k and j-k-l

      • getBondAngle

        public double getBondAngle(Atom atomi,
                           Atom atomj,
                           Atom atomk,
                           double[] dd)
        Returns the bond angle of i-j-k (degree) and the bond lengths dji and djk (bohr)
        Parameters:
        atomi - atom i
        atomj - atom j
        atomk - atom k
        dd - Distance between j-i and j-k: [0] dji, [1] djk
        Returns:
        bond angle i-j-k (degree)

      • getDihedralAngle

        public double getDihedralAngle(Atom atomi,
                               Atom atomj,
                               Atom atomk,
                               Atom atoml)
        Returns the dihedral angle between i-j-k and j-k-l
        Parameters:
        atomi - atom i
        atomj - atom j
        atomk - atom k
        atoml - atom l
        Returns:
        dihedral angle ijk-jkl (degree). NaN if either ijk or jkl are in line.

      • genAtomXYZ

        public double[] genAtomXYZ(Atom atm1,
                           double rr,
                           Atom atm2,
                           double thet,
                           Atom atm3,
                           double phi)
        Generates a position of an atom based on Z-matrix input
        Parameters:
        atm1 - Atom1
        rr - Distance between 0-1
        atm2 - Atom2
        thet - Angle of 0-1-2 (degree)
        atm3 - Atom3
        phi - Dihedral angle of 0-1-2-3 (degree)
        Returns:
        xyz coordinates of the new atom (bohr)

      • getCenterOfMass

        public Atom getCenterOfMass(Atom[] atoms)
        Calculates the center of mass of input atoms
        Parameters:
        atoms - The input atoms
        Returns:
        Atom with the center of mass coordinates and total mass
